ygData.subject: Re: Questions about item locations
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yeah it is also +3sv magic Sorry forgot that one ) Shadair ... From: John Penman  To:  Sent: Monday, May 24,
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yeah it is also +3sv magic Sorry forgot that one )

Shadair

From: John Penman <jpenman@...>

Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Questions about item locations


> From: "John Penman" <jpenman@...>

> The only stats on the Skull is +20 Mana.
>
> Shadair
